item.title: I due figli di Ringo
item.description: Two Sons of Ringo is a 1966 Italian western-parody film. It was the last film directed by Giorgio Simonelli who, for health reasons, left the production just before the end of filming and was replaced by Giuliano Carnimeo.

item.title: Professionisti per un massacro
item.description: Red Blood, Yellow Gold, is a 1967 Italian-Spanish spaghetti western film directed by Nando Cicero.

item.title: El Macho
item.description: El Macho is a 1977 Italian-Argentine Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Marcello Andrei.

item.title: Mark of Zorro
item.description: Mark of Zorro is a 1975 Italian adventure comedy film directed by Franco Lo Cascio.

item.title: Time of Vultures
item.description: Il tempo degli avvoltoi is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Nando Cicero.

item.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
item.description: Sartana's Here… Trade Your Pistol for a Coffin is a 1970 spaghetti western that is the third of the Sartana film series with George Hilton taking over the lead role from Gianni Garko. The film was shot in Italy and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo.

item.title: A Bullet for Sandoval
item.description: A Bullet for Sandoval is a 1969 spaghetti western film. It is a co-production between Italy and Spain. The film was generally well received by critics. For years, it was thought that famed Italian horror film director Lucio Fulci directed this western, but that was later disputed by the film's lead star George Hilton.

item.title: The Ruthless Four
item.description: The Ruthless Four is a 1968 Western film directed by Giorgio Capitani and starring Van Heflin.

item.title: Massacre Time
item.description: Massacre Time is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film starring Franco Nero and George Hilton. The film was released in the United States originally as The Brute and the Beast.

item.title: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better
item.description: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Osvaldo Civirani.
